labels.analysis: The MCP Server primarily acts as a search interface for the GPTers AI study community. It enables users to search community posts with advanced filtering options (date, author, board) to quickly find relevant information. The integration with MCP clients like Claude Desktop or Cursor suggests it enhances AI applications by providing access to community-generated knowledge.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Web Search & Research" fits because the server's core functionality is enabling search within a community knowledge base. The secondary label "AI/ML Tools" applies as it enhances AI applications by providing community-driven insights. The custom label reflects its specific niche in community-related search.

server_info_crawled.author: @leedoh-git/gpters-search-mcp-server-2
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide seamless access to GPTers AI study community knowledge by enabling powerful search capabilities through MCP. Filter search results by date, author, or board to quickly find relevant community posts. Integrate this server with MCP clients like Claude Desktop or Cursor to enhance your AI applications with community-driven insights.

tools.name: search_gpters
tools.description: Deploy Server GPTers Search Server @leedoh-git/gpters-search-mcp-server-2 Try in Playground search_gpters

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@leedoh-git/gpters-search-mcp-server-2/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: apiSecretKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: API secret key for GPTers search service
